reviews.text: What to say about this holy place. Really words are less. Beautifully built, well maintained and sacred place. Since the temple is made out of stones, the inside temperature is always less than the outside. You will be stunned to see the glow on the face of the Shree Mahalaxmi idol.

One of the nicest construction I have seen for a temple. Proper line management and staff members are very polite. People were helping for the first timer like me to guide and give me the tour of temple
Temple being a temple, Shree Ambabai Temple Kolhapur brings peace of mind and solace. Everything is well managed, people help all the devotees. The way to the main temple is properly chalked out.
This is Hindu place of worship of Goddess Ambabai (Devi) in Kolhapur. A place of special Importance in my life. Well managed. Believed by many.

Hindu Temple.
Very very good place visit.
relaxed atmosphere.
It's a great place to take small children.
And many more…

One of the most beautiful palaces I have ever seen. This is not a mere exaggeration but it's the fact. The palace, the surrounding areas covered by the garden, all are very neat and clean. The museum indexed the palace gives you the glimpse of the history of the rulers of the city and their successors. Just beside it is a ground where horse races are conducted. Outside the palace entry gate is a zoo, where one can catch the glimpse of different kinds of birds in the lake beside it.

This is very interesting historic place. Very beautiful palace and a fantastic  museum. We can see  ancient  oil paintings, Rulers old photos, coins, old clothes which is used by King. There are different kinds of arms and ammunition like old guns, spears,knives,swords etc.

Another beautiful  attraction in the museum is  stuffed wild animals and birds.

* I have posted few pictures of this place. Hit 'LIKE' if they are helpful to you.

Beautiful palace with a nice collection in the museum inside the palace. An adult ticket cost Rs 35 to see the museum. Photography is strictly prohibited, you are instructed to keep your phone switched off inside the palace. The lawn is lush green, people can sit and relax and can take as many pics as they want. Ideal time to invest is 1-2 hours.

Beautiful Palace!
Nice museum of historical items, furniture,photographs, wildlife & arms etc.
Palace n surrounding area is beautiful..neat n clean! Ample space for parking.
Small garden in front of palace is well maintained.
# only inconvenience is ticket window for the museum is on main gate of palace; that should be nearby palace.

Historical place. Entrance fee is must.  Parking space. Photos are not allowed. Not crowded. Usually it takes an hour. Beautiful background to take pictures. 
Palace is maintained and lawn as well. Huge trees around. Animals are present too. Specially interesting for kids and historical lovers

(Even though it is very old it is meaningful in Kolhapur history. A must sightseeing point)

What to say about this holy place. Really words are less. Beautifully built, well maintained and sacred place. Since the temple is made out of stones, the inside temperature is always less than the outside. You will be stunned to see the glow on the face of the Shree Mahalaxmi idol.

One of the nicest construction I have seen for a temple. Proper line management and staff members are very polite. People were helping for the first timer like me to guide and give me the tour of temple
Temple being a temple, Shree Ambabai Temple Kolhapur brings peace of mind and solace. Everything is well managed, people help all the devotees. The way to the main temple is properly chalked out.
This is Hindu place of worship of Goddess Ambabai (Devi) in Kolhapur. A place of special Importance in my life. Well managed. Believed by many.

Hindu Temple.
Very very good place visit.
relaxed atmosphere.
It's a great place to take small children.
And many more…

Very pleasant place for those who believe in God and nature lover.
Try to visit this place in evening , drive is good , there are so many roads to come to this place.
Try every road it has his own beauty
Great historical place in Kolhapur.. It has very impressive historic background.. Nature beauty also awesome

I visit here for every 6 months such a nice place the way to go this temple is scenic.. the temple is in the hilly region where you can go by private or government vehicles but it is best to visit in monsoon season.. because when we went there in the month of June it very scenic and a pleasure to watch we enjoyed a lot there.. even the temple is very good and traditional here you can see pink colour every where the story behind the temple is very good

Deeply pious devotees annually visit the temple admiring its ancient ambience and the faith in the Lord . Intermittently Cleaned by the government this place is Immaculate.  Thousands of devotees visit  this place in the period of what is known as 'Phetas'. This place should be a sure visit for all of the Devotees

This is virtuous place of Maharashtra. Everyday lots of people visit this temple. Even it's at higher level place in Kolhapur so you can enjoy natural sites. In the rainy season it's worth to go on temple through greenery. Best.

This museum is an amazing experience and a must visit for everyone they have on display life size statues depicting the daily life of villagers and people from all walks of life. The place is very family friendly and there is a lot of informative sculptures. My only tip would be to stay hydrated as you have to walk through out the open air museum which might lead to fatigue and dehydration.

Lovely museum (मठ). It showcases ancient rural life in India with very real like statues.  Many of the scenes like farmers, kids playing outdoors, water well , etc are very well presented in natural surroundings and from a distance it just feels like they are real. To have a good visit around you need minimum 2-3 hours and place is a must visit if you are in and around Kolhapur.

Very nice place for one day picnic. Specially for children's those can explore village life . But one suggestion that in summer it's too hot inside the place. They have to plant some trees for reduce summer effect.

Math is now introducing miracle garden.. new Attraction to be introduced... in few days time... It's superb. Waiting for it to be finished asap. Museum is already famous. this perfectly makes you realize how rich is the cultural heritage of India.

This is a big place with a museum of ancient India and Rural lifestyle of India. Is has 2 sections underground and an open one. 
    The underground part is of ancient India, sages who studied observing the nature and presented it in a scientific way, and the tales of all the Gods as written in scriptures.
     The open part depicts the lifestyle of rural India from all its corners. It also shows the various festivals of India (mostly of middle and south India)
    Now in this computer and machine age this place offers a showcase of the development of various vocations for the curious ones.
Very famous and delicious misal house in kolhapur.
Been frequenting this place since almost 10 years now..used to be really good.. But now the misal is a bit tasteless and 'panchat'. I wish they improve and live upto their legacy
Excellent pure kolhapuri test , must go for it
Very bad misal... Didn't liked at all
Good Service. Awesome misal.

If roadside eateries could serve these kinda piquant foodstuffs, how come I won't be a Streetfood Junkie?!
Tea Time Bhel at Rajabhau is what all you need to quench the binge! The concoction of numerous strands will do wonder.
Best bhel I've had. There's a stall at Khasbag khau-galli too, confirmed from the owner here, it's legit.
Best ever BHEL when I was in Kolhapur during my post graduation course I visit this place awesome experience consistent taste specially I love bhevda mixture
Awesome taste but still you can find many places in Kolhapur serving better than this.
Awsm bhel, try bhewda bhel
My favorite destination for cakes and pastries. Love the veg burger also here. Good place to relax and have some calories.
Very good bakery. Mexican pizza and my personal favourite veg hot dog. Only thing that u can't get non-vegetarian stuffs in there.
Had a delicious veg burger and irani mava cake. Wonderful !!!
Should always try the pastries here and pizza. There is limited open seating which looks good to hang out with friends. The only drawback is delay while preparation.
Oven bakery ie best in town
Was 110% Great meal and Service. All. Thank you. And your  Hostess  was a great  personality. She makes your store. Good  job!

Usually pretty good.  I haven't had a bad experience but it's been close.  Service is about as slow as it gets, but I come to expect it now.  They have the games you want to watch.  I like the Chicago style Italian beef sub and the BBQ chicken pizza.  The beer selection is good but don't expect the bartender to know anything but random trendy mixed drinks.  It is a chain now.  Treat it as such.  There will be pitfalls.  Take then in stride.

I had some kind of Italian sub, which had delicious meats, pesto, and big pieces of milk mozzarella. It tasted very good. I ordered the large, and saved half for the second day. It tasted great even then.

We had an enjoyable lunch. I decided to try their new pizza in the menu while my boyfriend ordered a large cheese pizza with mushrooms. Everything was prepared fresh and was tasty. The service was good too. Will definitely visit this place again in the near future.

The food was DELICIOUS, and the service was AMAZING- our server was also tending the bar and he still took AMAZING care of us. If you're in the area around the University of Dayton, I'd HIGHLY recommend this establishment
One of best and oldest bakery of Kolhapur. You get variety of bakery products in good price which has very good taste. Must taste once
One of the outstanding bakery in Kolhapur! All products are fresh and tasty, especially traditional Khari and toast is awesome.
Nice yummi products . Prices bit more than normal

One of the best Bakery.
All fresh food is available

exclusivity where taste, tradition and trends converge to blend into a confluence of unbelievable range. Dig into our mesmerizing cakes, heavenly baked seductive pastries, magical cookies, brown bread, multigrain bread So, mystical and magical, that will leave you infatuated with the timeless charm of khemraj Bakery for ever!

The ambience is really good and the staff treat u just perfect. 
But the food does not justify the pricing.
They have prices high but the taste and quantity is below average.
One time try. Won’t recommend 
The restaurant has a good history but don’t go on the history the food is very average and nothing special about the place! 
Probably they charge for the ambience.

The waiter's service is good but the cook does not care even after making a bad, even after speaking, even when I was regular,  the cook has changed I think. Waste of money Worst experience 
Food quality is not good
They have down their own quality of food. Previous time it was fantastic but now day's not so good.
Prices are high as compared to food quality and quantity. Previously around  6to 7 year back they are serving good quality of food at affordable prices.
I have come here after about 6 years. It has changed now it's elegant the food is awesome as it was. The thali options are many. Happy to be here again.
This is a nice place not too far away from the Bangalore Highway. Rates are slightly on the higher side. Breakfast buffet from 8:00am to 10:00am is decent. Definitely recommend booking in advance.

I am visiting this hotel for almost last 40 years. Same nice taste of the food but this time there was delay of almost 30 minutes which never occurred before. The waiter told that delay was due to order of 'Bhaakari'.

I took my colleagues there in search of quality mutton but the mutton quality was so bad I will never recommend this hotel to anyone in my life. Very third class mutton. Some pieces were 5/6mm and some were 1.5 inches. None of mutton pieces were cooked properly and the quantity is very very less. I suggest if you are taking your guests for eating authentic kolhapuri mutton then lookout for a hotel where cooks are local to kolhapur or where you find rush. Ask 3/4 people before trying mutton anywhere. I would rate 2 or 3 points out of hundred points to the mutton quality at opal.
UPDATE: My 4 year son was admitted to hospital on 28 Feb 2019 due to mutton eaten here. Just yesterday evening got discharge.
इनके वेटर को हजार जूते मारना चाहता हूं

Very neat and clean rooms. Some Repair to-be done for toilets on ground floor. 
Beast breakfast, nice restaurant and party hall. Famous for kolhapur style non veg food. Very near to highway. Ample parking.
Opal serves veg thali and non veg food..  They don't have non veg thali.. Food is OK and restaurant ambience is nice.. Quick service.. Good behavior..
